Posts.Content: May 13, 2012 10:23PM tap321 wrote: I just finished my TC x 4 3 weeks ago.  My oncotype was 19 and I did it reluctantly.  It goes by fast.  The first one was horrible.  Then I armed myself with vitamins and supplements (glutamine, potassium, minerals, B-100's, cat's claw and astragalus (they help the white blood cells), lysine, and a few others.  OK, it wasn't all approved by my Doctor, but I researched on the web, and they helped me get through the treatments.  I just didn't do anything 12 hours before, and 12 hours after treatment.
Posts.Title: Need help from anyone done with TC x 4 ailihe Melrosemelrose
